name: Heat Pump Heating & Cooling Rebate
description: $1,500 rebate to replace gas heater/furnace with electric heat pump; CARE customers get additional $1,000
fullDescription: Peninsula Clean Energy offers rebates for San Mateo County residents to replace gas furnaces with efficient electric heat pumps that provide both heating and cooling.
whatTheyOffer:
- $1,500 base rebate for heat pump installation
- Additional $1,000 for CARE/FERA customers ($2,500 total)
- Replaces gas furnace with electric heat pump
- Provides both heating and air conditioning
- Can combine with BayREN and federal incentives
- Access to vetted contractor network
howToGetIt:
1. Verify you're a Peninsula Clean Energy customer
2. Get quotes from licensed HVAC contractors
3. Choose a qualifying heat pump system
4. Complete installation with required permits
5. Submit rebate application with documentation
6. Receive rebate check after approval
keywords: heat pump, HVAC, rebate, Peninsula Clean Energy, PCE, San Mateo, heating, air conditioning, gas furnace, electrification
